about_the_game:
Welcome Gliderman

Your mission, if you accept it, is to explore this random world, while collecting points and speed boosts in the process.

In this flight game, you fly around a randomly generated world in a small glider. As you approach the terrain, you rack up points and fill up your nitro bar for later use. Try to survive for the most amount of time or trying to get a highscore or even get to the terminal velocity as fast as possible! Anything is possible.

Some Features:
  • Randomly Generated Terrain
  • Realistic aerodynamic rules
  • Smooth and relaxing but intense gameplay
